title: A High-End Apt In the Heart of Uptown**4 WEEKS FREE!**
posting_body: A New High-End Luxury Apartments in Uptown Dallas with Panoramic Views of Downtown!!
Located Directly on The Katy Trail and Walking Distance to Many Upscale Restaurants and Attractions.
Each Apartment Has Several Desirable Amenities, Such as Granite or Quartz Countertops, Stainless Steel Appliances, Authentic Hardwood Floors, and Even a Built-In Wine Fridge!
Other Amenities Included; Spa Bathroom with a Stand Up Shower and Oversized Soaking Tub, Walk-In Closet, with a Full-Size Washer and Dryer Included.

These Beautiful Apartment Amenities Include a Resort Roof-Top Sky Lounge Pool with Private Cabanas, a Wellness Center, State of an Art Gym, and even a Pet Park with a Pet Spa for Your Beloved Animals!
These Luxury Apartments Even Include Climate Controlled Hallways and Parking Garage and Elevators, What More Could You Ask For?
Most Importantly, They Have Great Management and Maintenance!!
Please Contact Jacquelyn with Dash Realty at
For More Information About This Breath-Taking Property.
**12 Month Lease or Longer, No Corporate Leases, and No Sublease**
